disobedience.question: When feeling frustrated with others within my community, did I reject the unity of the Church?

disobedience.question: Did you use hurtful language to mock the Church?

condoning.question: Did you condone an event where human remains were not properly buried?

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
